title: 115_hr3577
content: Results Through Innovation Act of 2017 This bill amends the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to require the Department of Agriculture to establish and carry out a program that provides grants on a competitive basis to states to carry out three-year projects to provide targeted employment and training services for Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program beneficiaries or hard-to-serve populations such as homeless and recently incarcerated individuals.
